output_list.description: The mintToken function allows the owner to increase the total supply of the token arbitrarily, which is a security vulnerability.
The freezeAccount function allows the owner to freeze an arbitrary user's assets, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue. It allows attackers to steal assets due to unprotected sell function.
The _transfer function allows arbitrary transfers, allowing attackers to steal assets due to unprotected sell function.
The sell function allows attackers to arbitrarily increase the sell price, allowing profit for the contract owner.
The buy function allows attackers to arbitrarily increase the buy price, allowing profit for the contract owner.
